content: download is for the whole *knit & crochet great afghans & throws* leaflet this pattern starts on page 10 > this extraordinary afghan is impressing while still being easy to crochet **gauge ** motif = 7 25 x 7 25 ***errata *** some printings leave out the directions for making the leaves **round 7** attach **cc** green to 3rd double_crochet of any petal of round 6 chain 3 in same double_crochet where yarn was attached make 2dc cluster as follows holding back on hook last loop of ea double_crochet make 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet yarn over an draw thru all loops on hook chain 2 make 3 double_crochet cluster in same double_crochet * chain 3 in 3rd double_crochet of next petal make a 3 treble_crochet cluster chain 4 3 dtr cluster chain 4 and 3 treble_crochet cluster for corner group chain 3 in 3rd double_crochet of next petal make a 3 double_crochet cluster chain 2 3 double_crochet cluster repeat from* around ending with chain 3 join to tip of first cluster break off and fasten also called grand gardenias
